mapper.select: /* 육성 현황 조회 */ SELECT ENT_NOCS , ENT_CRTR_YMD , INVEST_NOCS , INVEST_CRTR_YMD , AFFILIATE_NOCS , AFFILIATE_CRTR_YMD FROM KB_RSLT_INFO

/* 메인 비주얼 조회 */ SELECT VISUAL.MAIN_SN AS MAIN_SN , VISUAL.MAIN_CN AS MAIN_CN , FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_NM AS MAIN_FILE_NAME , FILES.FILE_PATH AS MAIN_PATH FROM KB_MAIN_INFO VISUAL , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE VISUAL.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) AND VISUAL.EXPSR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_NO ASC
